SEARCH
Package org.rcmd.jneuroformats

Class FsMghHeader

java.lang.Object
org.rcmd.jneuroformats.FsMghHeader
public class FsMghHeader extends Object
Models a FreeSurfer label, can be a surface label or a volume label. The label is defined by a set of vertices or voxels that are part of the structure, and a value that is assigned to all vertices or voxels that are part of the structure. Sometimes the value is not needed, and can be set to 0.

      public int mriDatatype
      The MRI data type, one of the MRI_* constants defined in FsMgh. This tells you which of the data arrays to use.

      The degrees of freedom (DOF) for the MRI data.

      The Mdc matrix, used to compute the vox2RAS matrix and related information.

    • Pxyz_c

      public List<Float> Pxyz_c
      The RAS origin. Sometimes referred to as 'Point XYZ center' or 'Pxyz_c'. 3 float values, stored in the file as 3 float values.

  • Constructor Details

    • FsMghHeader

      public FsMghHeader()
      Default constructor for FsMghHeader. Initializes empty lists for Mdc and Pxyz_c.

  • Method Details

    • getNumValues

      public int getNumValues()
      Get the number of values in the data part of the file.
      Returns:
      the number of values in the data part of the file.

    • fromByteBuffer

      public static FsMghHeader fromByteBuffer(ByteBuffer buf) throws IOException
      Read an FsMghHeader instance from a Buffer in FreeSurfer MGH format. Reads the header and advances the buffer to the data part of the file.
      Parameters:
      buf - the buffer to read from.
      Returns:
      an FsMghHeader instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs, or if the file is not in valid MGH format.

    • getHeaderSizeInBytes

      public int getHeaderSizeInBytes()
      Get the size of the header part of the file, in bytes.
      Returns:
      the size of the header part of the file, in bytes. This is always the same for the MGH format, which uses a fixed size header.

    • getDataSizeInBytes

      public int getDataSizeInBytes()
      Get the size of the data part of the file, in bytes. Data size is computed based on header information: data type and number of values.
      Returns:
      the size of the data part of the file, in bytes.

    • writeFsMghHeaderToByteBuffer

      protected ByteBuffer writeFsMghHeaderToByteBuffer(ByteBuffer buf) throws IOException
      Write the FsMghHeader to a ByteBuffer.
      Parameters:
      buf - an existing ByteBuffer to write to. If null, a new ByteBuffer will be created.
      Returns:
      the ByteBuffer, with the FsMghHeader written to it.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.

    • fromFsMghFile

      public static FsMghHeader fromFsMghFile(Path filePath) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException
      Read an FsMghHeader instance from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the name of the file to read, as a Path object. Get on from a string by something like `java.nio.file.Paths.Path.get("myfile.txt")`.
      Returns:
      an FsMghHeader instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs, or if the file is not in valid MGH format.
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist.
